title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 583.3 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 583.3 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) College
community member--every person who is officially affiliated with the State

University College at Oswego, in a full-time or part-time capacity, as a
student and/or faculty or staff member, and every employee, board member or
officer of any organization over which the State University College at Oswego
has direct or indirect control. (b) Student--any person registered as a student at the State University College at

Oswego for the purpose of attending classes. This definition includes persons
registered as undergraduate, graduate, extension, nonmatriculated and special
students. (c) Subject premises--the
campus of the State University College at Oswego and any other premises or
property under such college's control. (d) Vehicle--every device in, upon or by
which any person or property is or may be transported or drawn upon a highway, except devices moved by human power. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
583.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
